description.fr:
Lorsque {Summoning:1440!} est déplacée par un sort ou un effet\_: Inflige son {%AT} aux personnages autour <sprite name="cell_around"> d'elle.
\---
{%Death} Ressuscite avec toute sa {%PVMAX} et gagne {ATvalue:pow,percent,+}.
description.en:
When {Summoning:1440!} is moved by a spell or an effect: Inflicts her {%AT} on characters around <sprite name="cell_around"> her.
\---
{%Death} Revives with all her {%PVMAX} and gains {ATvalue:pow,percent,+}.
description.es:
Cuando un hechizo o un efecto desplaza a {Summoning:1440!}: Inflige su {%AT} a los personajes a su alrededor <sprite name="cell_around">.
\---
{%Death} Resucita con toda su {%PVMAX} y gana {ATvalue:pow,percent,+}.
description.de:
Wird {Summoning:1440!} durch einen Zauber oder Effekt bewegt: Verursacht ihren {%AT} bei Charakteren in ihrem Umkreis <sprite name="cell_around"> als Schaden.
\---
{%Death} Wird mit {%PVMAX} wiedererweckt und erhält {ATvalue:pow,percent,+}.
description.pt:
Quando {Summoning:1440!} é deslocada por um feitiço ou um efeito: Inflige seu {%AT} aos personagens em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dela.
\---
{%Death} Ressuscita com toda a sua {%PVMAX} e ganha {ATvalue:pow,percent,+}.
